Regulation Name(s): Device To Detect And Measure Non-Microbial Analyte(S) In Human Clinical Specimens To Aid In Assessment Of Patients With Suspected Sepsis
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Cytovale IntelliSep test and Cytovale System using deformability cytometry to assess leukocyte properties for early detection of sepsis in adult emergency department patients.
Indications for Use Summary: Aids in early detection of sepsis with organ dysfunction in adult patients presenting to the Emergency Department with signs and symptoms of infection, based on assessment of leukocyte biophysical properties from EDTA-anticoagulated whole blood.
